title: nAn unakku
sahitya:
nAn unakku bhAram AvEnO inda jnAla uyirait-tAngum arasE


anupallavi

  vAnukku min aNuvum bhAramO mangai bhAgA gangAdharA


caraNam    marattinukku malar kani ilai vaLarum bhAramO mAdinukku madalai inbam tIdu sheyyumO
uratta vIranukku vALum karattai naikkumO ulagil aindu vinaiyait-tAngum oruvA en gurunAthanE
